Instructive: Write an instructional guide on how to stay focused while studying.
Interrogative: Why is machine learning important in today's world?
Creative: Imagine a future where AI helps humans live on Mars. Describe it.
Technical: Explain how a convolutional neural network works in image classification.
Conversational: Hey assistant, can you tell me how to make a resume stand out?
Funny: Write a humorous conversation between a robot and a coffee machine.
Motivational: Give me a motivational quote to start my day with confidence.
